ActionButtonStyle.title: Button style
ActionButtonStyle.description: The style/color scheme of the button.

AllowedValidationMasks.title: Validation types
AllowedValidationMasks.description: List of validation types to show

nb.title: Audio source (when using norwegian bokm√•l language)

nn.title: Audio source (when using norwegian nynorsk language)

ButtonColor.title: Button color override
ButtonColor.description: The color scheme of the button.

ButtonStyle.title: Button style
ButtonStyle.description: The style/color scheme of the button.

media.title: Media
media.description: Media to display on the top/bottom of the card (must reference an Image, Audio or Video component

description.title: Description/body text
description.description: Full text displayed underneath the title, above any component children

children.title: Children
children.description: Child component IDs to show inside the card

CardsColor.title: Card color
CardsColor.description: The color style for these cards

CardsMediaPosition.title: ImagePosition
CardsMediaPosition.description: Position of the media (image/video/audio) in each card

allOf.title: Summary properties
allOf.description: Properties for how to display the summary of the component

displayType.title: Display type
displayType.description: How data should be displayed for the radio in the summary

children.title: Children
children.description: List of child component IDs to show inside the Accordion (limited to a few component types)

openByDefault.title: Open by default
openByDefault.description: Boolean value indicating if the accordion should be open by default

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the accordion group

children.title: Children
children.description: List of child component IDs to show inside the Accordion (limited to a few component types)

title.title: Button title/text
title.description: The text to display on the button.

action.title: Action
action.description: The action to perform when the button is clicked.

simplified.title: Simplified
simplified.description: Whether to use the simplified address input or not

body.title: Body
body.description: The body text of the alert

title.title: Title
title.description: Title shown above the attachment list

dataTypeIds.title: Data type IDs
dataTypeIds.description: List of data type IDs for the attachment list to show

altText.title: Alt text
altText.description: Alternative text for the audio (for screen readers).

children.title: Children
children.description: Child component IDs of button-like components to be rendered in this group

minMediaHeight.title: minMediaHeight
minMediaHeight.description: Fixed minimum height of media (if media is present)

minWidth.title: minWidth
minWidth.description: Fixed minimum width of the card

showLabelsInTable.title: Show label when single option in table
showLabelsInTable.description: Boolean value indicating if the label should be visible when only one option exists in table

alertOnChange.title: Alert on change
alertOnChange.description: Boolean value indicating if the component should alert on change

title.title: Title
title.description: Title (passed on as the "text" property to the component)

tagName.title: Tag name
tagName.description: Web component tag name to use

minDate.title: Earliest date
minDate.description: Sets the earliest allowed date. Can also use keyword 'today' to disable all past dates dynamically based on the current date. Defaults to 1900-01-01T12:00:00.000Z.

maxDate.title: Latest date
maxDate.description: Sets the latest allowed date. Can also use keyword 'today' to disable all future dates dynamically based on the current date. Defaults to 2100-01-01T12:00:00.000Z.

timeStamp.title: Include time
timeStamp.description: Boolean value indicating if the date time should be stored as a timeStamp. Defaults to true. If true: 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ', if false 'YYYY-MM-DD';

format.title: Date format
format.description: Date format used when displaying the date to the user. The user date format from the locale will be prioritized over this setting.

alertOnChange.title: Alert on change
alertOnChange.description: Boolean value indicating if the component should alert on change

maxFileSizeInMB.title: Max file size (MB)
maxFileSizeInMB.description: Sets the maximum file size allowed in megabytes

maxNumberOfAttachments.title: Max number of attachments
maxNumberOfAttachments.description: Sets the maximum number of attachments allowed to upload

minNumberOfAttachments.title: Min number of attachments
minNumberOfAttachments.description: Sets the minimum number of attachments required to upload

hasCustomFileEndings.title: Has custom file endings
hasCustomFileEndings.description: Boolean value indicating if the component has valid file endings

validFileEndings.title: Valid file endings
validFileEndings.description: A separated string of valid file endings to upload. If not set all endings are accepted.

alertOnDelete.title: Alert on delete
alertOnDelete.description: Boolean value indicating if warning popup should be displayed when attempting to delete an element

tagTitle.title: Tag title
tagTitle.description: The title to show when selecting a tag for each uploaded file

maxFileSizeInMB.title: Max file size (MB)
maxFileSizeInMB.description: Sets the maximum file size allowed in megabytes

maxNumberOfAttachments.title: Max number of attachments
maxNumberOfAttachments.description: Sets the maximum number of attachments allowed to upload

minNumberOfAttachments.title: Min number of attachments
minNumberOfAttachments.description: Sets the minimum number of attachments required to upload

hasCustomFileEndings.title: Has custom file endings
hasCustomFileEndings.description: Boolean value indicating if the component has valid file endings

validFileEndings.title: Valid file endings
validFileEndings.description: A separated string of valid file endings to upload. If not set all endings are accepted.

alertOnDelete.title: Alert on delete
alertOnDelete.description: Boolean value indicating if warning popup should be displayed when attempting to delete an element

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the group (shown above the group)

description.title: Description
description.description: The description text shown underneath the title

groupingIndicator.title: Set grouping indicator
groupingIndicator.description: Can visually group components together by indenting them or by putting them in a panel.

children.title: Children
children.description: Array of component IDs that should be displayed in the group

headingLevel.title: Heading level
headingLevel.description: The heading level of the group title.

title.title: Title
title.description: The text to display in the header

help.title: Help text
help.description: The text to display in the help tooltip/popup

title.title: Title/text/content
title.description: The content of the IFrame. Can for example be be set to a string containing HTML, a text resource key, or an expression looking up a value from the data model

altTextImg.title: Alt text
altTextImg.description: Alternative text for the image (for screen readers).

help.title: Help text
help.description: Help text for the image (shown in help text tooltip/popup)

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix shown before the input field

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: Suffix shown after the input field

variant.title: Input variant
variant.description: The variant of the input field (text or search).

maxLength.title: Max length
maxLength.description: Max length of the input field. Will add a counter to let the user know how many characters are left.

elements.title: Elements
elements.description: Which elements to show in the instance information

title.title: Title
title.description: The title/text to display on the button

description.title: Description
description.description: The description text for the Likert table.

leftColumnHeader.title: Left column header
leftColumnHeader.description: The header text for the left column in the Likert table

questions.title: Questions
questions.description: The questions to be displayed in each row (use a dynamic text resource)

questionDescriptions.title: Question descriptions
questionDescriptions.description: The descriptions to be displayed in each row (use a dynamic text resource)

questionHelpTexts.title: Question help texts
questionHelpTexts.description: The help texts to be displayed in each row (use a dynamic text resource)

help.title: Help
help.description: Help text of the Likert component/row

showLabelsInTable.title: Show label when single option in table
showLabelsInTable.description: Boolean value indicating if the label should be visible when only one option exists in table

download.title: Download
download.description: Download target instead of navigating to it. Non-blank value is passed to the download attribute and becomes the filename of the downloaded file. Blank value means default filename is used.

openInNewTab.title: Open in new tab
openInNewTab.description: Open the link in a new tab

tableHeaders.title: Table Headers
tableHeaders.description: An object where the fields in the datalist is mapped to headers. Must correspond to datalist representing a row. Can be added to the resource files to change between languages.

sortableColumns.title: Sortable columns
sortableColumns.description: An array of column keys that can be sorted (note that your API backend needs to support this as well). The column has to be represented by the the header name that is written in tableHeaders.

dataListId.title: Data list ID
dataListId.description: The ID of the data list to use (must be implemented in your backend).

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: Boolean value indicating if the options should be instance aware. Defaults to false.

mapping.description: **Deprecated**: Will be removed in the next major version. Use `queryParameters` with expressions instead.

summaryBinding.title: Data model binding to show in summary
summaryBinding.description: Specify one of the keys in the `dataModelBindings` object to show in the summary component for the list.

bindingToShowInSummary.title: Binding to show in summary
bindingToShowInSummary.description:
**Deprecated**: This property will be removed in the next major version, use `summaryBinding` instead.
The value of this binding will be shown in the summary component for the list. It expects a path in the datamodel. The binding must be one of the specified bindings under dataModelBindings.

tableHeadersMobile.title: Table Headers Mobile
tableHeadersMobile.description: An array of strings representing the columns that is chosen to be shown in the mobile view.

alertOnChange.title: Alert on change
alertOnChange.description: Boolean value indicating if the component should alert on change

compact.title: Compact
compact.description: Change appearance of navbar as compact in desktop view

back.title: Back
back.description: Text on the back/previous page button

next.title: Next
next.description: Text on the next page button

showBackButton.title: Show back button
showBackButton.description: Shows two buttons (back/next) instead of just 'next'.

id.title: ID
id.description: The component ID. Must be unique within all layouts/pages in a layout-set. Cannot end with <dash><number>.

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be hidden. Defaults to false.

help.title: Help text
help.description: Help text, optionally shown in a tooltip

description.title: Description
description.description: Description, optionally shown below the title

description.title: Description
description.description: Description, optionally shown below the title

alertOnChange.title: Alert on change
alertOnChange.description: Boolean value indicating if the component should alert on change

showLabelsInTable.title: Show label when single option in table
showLabelsInTable.description: Boolean value indicating if the label should be visible when only one option exists in table

showAsCard.title: Show as card
showAsCard.description: Boolean value indicating if the options should be displayed as cards. Defaults to false.

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the group (shown above each instance in a Summary)

description.title: Description
description.description: The description text shown underneath the title

add_button_full.title: Add button (full) (for repeating groups)
add_button_full.description: The text for the "Add" button (overrides "add_button", and sets the full text for the button)

add_button.title: Add button (suffix) (for repeating groups)
add_button.description: The text for the "Add" button (used as a suffix after the default button text)

save_button.title: Save button (for repeating groups)
save_button.description: The text for the "Save" button when the repeating group item is in edit mode

save_and_next_button.title: Save and next button (for repeating groups)
save_and_next_button.description: The text for the "Save and next" button when the repeating group item is in edit mode (only displayed if edit.saveAndNextButton is true)

edit_button_close.title: Edit button (close) (for repeating groups)
edit_button_close.description: The text for the "Edit" button when the repeating group item is in edit mode (i.e. the user can close the edit mode)

edit_button_open.title: Edit button (open) (for repeating groups)
edit_button_open.description: The text for the "Edit" button when the repeating group item is not in edit mode (i.e. the user can open the edit mode)

pagination_next_button.title: Next button in pagination
pagination_next_button.description: The text for the "Next" button in pagination

pagination_back_button.title: Back button in pagination
pagination_back_button.description: The text for the "Back" button in pagination

children.title: Children
children.description: List of child component IDs to show inside (will be repeated according to the number of rows in the data model binding)

pagination.title: Pagination options
pagination.description: Pagination options for the repeating group rows.

maxCount.title: Max number of rows
maxCount.description: Maximum number of rows that can be added.

minCount.title: Min number of rows
minCount.description: Minimum number of rows that should be added. If the user has not added enough rows, the repeating group will show a validation error

tableHeaders.title: Table headers
tableHeaders.description: Array of component IDs that should be displayed as table headers. If not defined, all components referenced in the "children" property will be displayed as table headers

hiddenRow.title: Hidden row?
hiddenRow.description: Expression or boolean indicating whether each row should be hidden. An expression will be evaluated per row, and if it evaluates to true, the row will be hidden. If set to true, all rows will be hidden.

stickyHeader.title: Sticky header
stickyHeader.description: If set to true, the header of the repeating group will be sticky

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the subform component

description.title: Description
description.description: The description text shown underneath the title

addButton.title: Add button (suffix)
addButton.description: The text for the "Add" button (used as a suffix after the default button text)

layoutSet.title: Layout set ID
layoutSet.description: The layout set to load for this subform

headerContent.title: The column header value
headerContent.description: The header value to display. May contain a text resource bindings, but no data model lookups.

query.title: The cell value via data model lookup
query.description: The cell value to display from a data model lookup (dot notation).

default.title: The default cell value
default.description: The cell value to display if `query` returns no result.

summaryDelimiter.title: The summary view cell delimiter
summaryDelimiter.description: The value used to separate cells/elements in a summary view where rich layout is not available. Typically a comma, dash or similar.

target.description: Config for what should be rendered. If you set taskId, this property is optional.

taskId.title: Task ID
taskId.description: Use this if you want to render something from another task.

hideEmptyFields.description: Set this to true if you don't want to show fields that have not been filled out.

componentRef.title: Component reference
componentRef.description: String value indicating which layout component (by ID) the summary is for.

largeGroup.title: Large group
largeGroup.description: Boolean value indicating if summary of repeating group should be displayed in large format. Useful for displaying summary with nested groups.

excludedChildren.title: Excluded child components
excludedChildren.description: Array of component IDs that should not be shown in a repeating group's summary

returnToSummaryButtonTitle.title: ReturnToSummaryButtonTitle
returnToSummaryButtonTitle.description: Used to specify the text on the NavigationButtons component that should be used after clicking "Change" on the summary component

maxLength.title: Max length
maxLength.description: Max length of the input field. Will add a counter to let the user know how many characters are left.

altText.title: Alt text
altText.description: Alternative text for the video (for screen readers).

readOnly.title: Read only/disabled?
readOnly.description:
Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be read only/disabled. Defaults to false.
Please note that even with read-only fields in components, it may currently be possible to update the field by modifying the request sent to the API or through a direct API call.

required.title: Required?
required.description: Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be required. Defaults to false.

labelFrom.title: Fetch label from other component
labelFrom.description: Set this to a component id to display the label from that component

text.title: Text
text.description: Text to display (can also be a key in text resources)

cells.title: Cells in table row
cells.description: The list of cells in this row

GridRows.title: Rows in Grid or Grid-like component
GridRows.description: The list of rows in this grid

allOf.title: Summary properties
allOf.description: Properties for how to display the summary of the component

isCompact.title: Compact summary
isCompact.description: Boolean value indicating if the summary should be compact

HTMLAutoCompleteValues.title: HTML autocomplete values
HTMLAutoCompleteValues.description: Autocomplete hints to the browser. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete

dataType.title: Data type
dataType.description: The name of the datamodel type to reference

field.title: Field
field.description: The path to the property using dot-notation

currency.title: Language-sensitive currency formatting
currency.description: Enables currency to be language sensitive based on selected app language. Note: parts that already exist in number property are not overridden by this prop.

unit.title: Language-sensitive number formatting based on unit
unit.description: Enables unit along with thousand and decimal separators to be language sensitive based on selected app language. They are configured in number property. Note: parts that already exist in number property are not overridden by this prop.

position.title: Position of the currency/unit symbol
position.description: Display the unit as prefix or suffix. Default is prefix. (Use only when using currency or unit options)

allOf.title: Grid
allOf.description: Settings for the components grid. Used for controlling horizontal alignment

editInTable.title: Edit in table
editInTable.description: If set to true, the component will be editable directly in the table view.

showInExpandedEdit.title: Show in expanded edit
showInExpandedEdit.description: If set to true, the component will be shown in the expanded edit view. This is also the default behaviour, but can be turned off for components that are only to be edited in the table view.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: The mode of the repeating group

addButton.title: Add button
addButton.description: Expression or boolean indicating whether to show the "Add" button

saveButton.title: Save button
saveButton.description: Expression or boolean indicating whether to show the "Save" button

deleteButton.title: Delete button
deleteButton.description: Expression or boolean indicating whether to show the "Delete" button

editButton.title: Edit button
editButton.description: Expression or boolean indicating whether to show the "Edit" button

multiPage.title: Multi page functionality
multiPage.description: Turning this on makes it possible to display the edit mode for a repeating group with multiple inner pages. Every component referenced in the "children" property should have a prefix with the page number it should be displayed on (e.g. "1:component1", "2:component2", etc.)

openByDefault.title: Open by default
openByDefault.description: If set to true, a row of the repeating group will be opened by default, if the group has no rows already. If set to "first" or "last", the first or last row will be opened by default

alertOnDelete.title: Alert on delete
alertOnDelete.description: Expression or boolean indicating whether to show an alert when the user clicks the "Delete" button, prompting them to confirm the deletion

saveAndNextButton.title: Save and next button
saveAndNextButton.description: Expression or boolean indicating whether to show the "Save and next" button when editing a repeating group row. This button will save the current row and open the next row for editing.

alwaysShowAddButton.title: Always show add button
alwaysShowAddButton.description: If set to true, the "Add" button will always be shown, even if the user is currently editing another row

nb.title: Image source (when using norwegian bokm√•l language)

nn.title: Image source (when using norwegian nynorsk language)

ILayoutFile.title: Altinn layout
ILayoutFile.description: Schema that describes the layout configuration for Altinn applications.

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Expression that will hide the page/form layout if true

ILikertFilter.title: Filter
ILikertFilter.description: Optionally filter specific rows within the likert group using start/stop indexes for displaying the desired ones(beware that start index starts at zero, and stop index starts at one, so {start, stop} = {0, 3} will display 3 rows, not 4)

IMapping.title: Mapping
IMapping.description: A mapping of key-value pairs (usually used for mapping a path in the data model to a query string parameter).

IOptionSource.title: Option source
IOptionSource.description: Allows for fetching options from the data model, pointing to a repeating group structure

dataType.title: Data type
dataType.description: The datamodel where the repeating group data is stored. If not specified, the data model defined in the layout-set will be used.

group.title: Group
group.description: The repeating group to base options on.

label.title: Label
label.description: A label of the option displayed in Radio- and Checkbox groups. Can be plain text, a text resource binding, or a dynamic expression.

value.title: Value
value.description: Field in the group that should be used as value

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the option displayed in Radio- and Checkbox groups. Can be plain text, a text resource binding, or a dynamic expression.

helpText.title: Help Text
helpText.description: A help text for the option displayed in Radio- and Checkbox groups. Can be plain text, a text resource binding, or a dynamic expression.

IPageBreak.title: Page break
IPageBreak.description: Optionally insert page-break before/after component when rendered in PDF

breakBefore.title: Page break before
breakBefore.description: PDF only: Value or expression indicating whether a page break should be added before the component. Can be either: 'auto' (default), 'always', or 'avoid'.

breakAfter.title: Page break after
breakAfter.description: PDF only: Value or expression indicating whether a page break should be added after the component. Can be either: 'auto' (default), 'always', or 'avoid'.

IPagination.title: Pagination
IPagination.description: Pagination settings. Set this to enable pagination (must be supported by backend).

alternatives.title: Alternatives
alternatives.description: List of page sizes the user can choose from. Make sure to test the performance of the largest number of items per page you are allowing.

default.title: Default
default.description: The pagination size that is set to default.

variant.title: Panel variant
variant.description: Change the look of the panel

showIcon.title: Show icon
showIcon.description: Show icon in the panel header

IQueryParameters.title: Query parameters
IQueryParameters.description: A mapping of query string parameters to values. Will be appended to the URL when fetching options.

allowPopups.title: Allow popups
allowPopups.description: Sets "allow-popups" in the sandbox attribute on the iframe. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/iframe#sandbox

allowPopupsToEscapeSandbox.title: Allow popups to escape sandbox
allowPopupsToEscapeSandbox.description: Sets "allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox" in the sandbox attribute on the iframe. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/iframe#sandbox

optionsId.title: Dynamic options (fetched from server)
optionsId.description: ID of the option list to fetch from the server

mapping.description: **Deprecated**: Will be removed in the next major version. Use `queryParameters` with expressions instead.

secure.title: Secure options (when using optionsId)
secure.description: Whether to call the secure API endpoint when fetching options from the server (allows for user/instance-specific options)

sortOrder.description: Sorts the code list in either ascending or descending order by label.

preselectedOptionIndex.title: Preselected option index
preselectedOptionIndex.description: Index of the option to preselect (if no option has been selected yet)

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of cell in % or 'auto'. Defaults to 'auto'

ITableColumnsAlignText.title: Align Text
ITableColumnsAlignText.description: Choose text alignment between 'left', 'center', or 'right' for text in table cells. Defaults to 'left' for text and 'right' for numbers.

lineWrap.title: Line Wrap
lineWrap.description: Toggle line wrapping on or off. Defaults to true

maxHeight.title: Max Height
maxHeight.description: Determines the number of lines to display in table cell before hiding the rest of the text with an ellipsis (...). Defaults to 2.

LayoutStyle.title: Layout
LayoutStyle.description: Define the layout style for the options

LinkStyle.title: Style
LinkStyle.description: The style of the link (a primary/secondary button, or an actual link)

url.title: Map layer url
url.description: Url to a map tile. {z}/{x}/{y} will be replaced with tile coordinates, {s} will be replaced with a random subdomain if subdomains are given

attribution.title: Attribution
attribution.description: Ascribing a work or remark to a particular unit for recognition

subdomains.title: Subdomains
subdomains.description: List of subdomains. Used for balancing the load on different map tiling servers. A random one will replace {s} in the defined url.

allOf.title: Summary properties
allOf.description: Properties for how to display the summary of the component

displayType.title: Display type
displayType.description: How data should be displayed for the radio in the summary

NumberFormatProps.title: Number formatting options
NumberFormatProps.description: These options are sent directly to react-number-format in order to make it possible to format pretty numbers in the input field.

page.title: Page
page.description: Which pages should be validated when the next button is clicked.

SaveWhileTyping.title: Automatic saving while typing
SaveWhileTyping.description: Lets you control how long we wait before saving the value locally while typing. This value is usually also used to determine how long we wait before saving the value to the server. The default value is 400 milliseconds.

renderAsSummary.title: Render as summary
renderAsSummary.description: Boolean value indicating if the component should be rendered as a summary. Defaults to false.

forceShowInSummary.title: Force show in summary
forceShowInSummary.description: Will force show the component in a summary even if hideEmptyFields is set to true in the summary component.

SummaryDisplayProperties.title: Display properties
SummaryDisplayProperties.description: Optional properties to configure how summary is displayed

hideChangeButton.title: Hide change button
hideChangeButton.description: Set to true if the change button should be hidden for the summary component. False by default.

hideValidationMessages.title: Hide validation messages
hideValidationMessages.description: Set to true if the validation messages should be hidden for the component when shown in Summary. False by default.

useComponentGrid.title: Use component grid
useComponentGrid.description: Set to true to allow summary component to use the grid setup of the referenced component. For group summary, this will apply for all group child components.

hideBottomBorder.title: Hide bottom border
hideBottomBorder.description: Set to true to hide the blue dashed border below the summary component. False by default.

nextButton.title: Display the next button
nextButton.description: Set to to true display a "next" button as well as the return to summary button

children.title: Children
children.description: List of component IDs that should be displayed in the Tab

tableTitle.title: Table title
tableTitle.description: Title used in the table view (overrides the default title)

shortName.title: Short name (for validation)
shortName.description: Alternative name used for required validation messages (overrides the default title)

requiredValidation.title: Required validation message
requiredValidation.description: Full validation message shown when the component is required and no value has been entered (overrides both the default and shortName)

title.title: Title
title.description: Label text/title shown above the component

description.title: Description
description.description: Label description shown above the component, below the title

help.title: Help text
help.description: Help text shown in a tooltip when clicking the help button

summaryTitle.title: Summary title
summaryTitle.description: Title used in the summary view (overrides the default title)

summaryAccessibleTitle.title: Accessible summary title
summaryAccessibleTitle.description: Title used for aria-label on the edit button in the summary view (overrides the default and summary title)

nb.title: Video source (when using norwegian bokm√•l language)

nn.title: Video source (when using norwegian nynorsk language)
